sentences.sentence: Niger's presidential guard ousted and held democratically elected President Mohamed Bazoum in the coup on the 26th of July. ECOWAS immediately imposed sanctions on Niger and gave General Abdurrahman Chani, the coup leader, one week to restore Bazoum to power or face the potential use of force. Chani has vowed to respond immediately to any foreign intervention.
